banner.detail: Lingble is your enduring partner to take you to the pinnacle of global eCommerce
description.header: Cross-border eCommerce is straining your relationships and it is not sustainable
description.retailers.title: Local retailers and distributors
description.retailers.content:
• Feel like you are intruding into their market.
  • Do not appreciate you under-cutting their prices
description.customers.title: International Customers
description.customers.content:
• Are confused over different brand websites
  • Are upset that there is a lower price on a different website after purchase
